#summary HIVE 2.2 Release Notes

= Release Notes =

The HIVE 2.2 release includes the following minor features and bug fixes:
 * Issue [http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=49 #49]: Add localization support  
 * Issue [http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=50 #50]: 
Ability to select minimum phrase occurrences
